CustomField.description: Determines how the pattern detection and fix logic is executed. Standard uses built-in SOQL queries and Fix_Type__c routing. Declarative uses JSON-based configuration in Fix_Config__c. Apex_Plugin invokes a custom class implementing the PatternPlugin interface.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Standard: Uses Query_Condition__c and Fix_Type__c. Declarative: Uses JSON actions in Fix_Config__c. Apex_Plugin: Invokes custom class in Apex_Handler_Class__c.
CustomField.label: Logic Type
